General.Name: President Automobile Industries Public Company Limited
General.Description: President Automobile Industries Public Company Limited produces and distributes automotive air conditioning components in Thailand, the Middle East, South East Asia, South Asia, North America, South America, Europe, East Asia, and internationally. The company offers condensers, evaporators, refrigerants, compressors, intercoolers, oil coolers, air conditioning electrical parts, and other accessories. President Automobile Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Krathum Baen, Thailand.

0.Name: Mr. Somchai  Lertkajornkitti
